title: Every time I play league while my sister is playing her ping rises to 3000
body: Every time I play league, my sister starts to lag and I have been wondering how to fix this. I really wanna play normals with her but I cant when she lags. I wanna know if anyone can help with this problem.

replies.body: Your connection sounds like it's pretty unstable, and could be suffering from packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted match so we can get an overview of what's happening.  Let me know what you find!
Sounds like you have DSL or low speed internet. We cant fix that for you, unless someone is going to donate money for an upgrade.
